meanings.definition: Not of or relating to a royal family.
meanings.sent1: The nonroyal guests were seated at a separate table during the royal banquet.
meanings.sent2: She preferred a nonroyal lifestyle, away from the pomp and ceremony of royalty.
meanings.sent3: The nonroyal cat thought it was the king of the house, demanding treats all day.
meanings.sent4: In a world of kings and queens, she found solace in her nonroyal status, free from obligations.
meanings.sent5: The nonroyal garden was a peaceful retreat, far from the grandeur of the royal palace.

meanings.definition: A person who is not a member of a royal family.
meanings.sent1: The nonroyal was welcomed into the palace as a distinguished guest.
meanings.sent2: As a nonroyal, he had to earn his place in society through hard work and dedication.
meanings.sent3: The nonroyal joked about starting a rebellion against the royal family for fun.
meanings.sent4: She felt like a nonroyal in a world of kings and queens, always on the outside looking in.
meanings.sent5: The nonroyal's humble origins did not diminish his kindness and generosity towards others.
